short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost Salesforce OmniStudio Productivity with One-Click Access to IP, DR, Flexcards, and OmniScripts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool allows you to open and execute Integration Procedures (IP), Data Raptors (DR), Flexcards, and OmniScripts seamlessly. 
With just one click you can access the latest active versions of OmniScripts, Flexcards, Integration Procedures, and Data Raptors, streamlining your workflow and saving valuable time.

ðŸ¤”How To Use :
1. Install and make sure the extension is active.
2. Open your Salesforce org (lightning recommended)
3. Click "OS Helper" button at the right top corner.
4. Load any component of your choice, click "Open in SF" button to open any component in Salesforce.
5. For finding any FlexCard or OmniScript on active page, open Extension from top bar (you can pin it for easy access) and click find components.

ðŸ«¡Optional : you can also execute IP / DR from the extension itself without opening the org.
